name: Oops! I left the Snowstorm Generator On
name_original: Oops! I left the Snowstorm Generator On
description:
Oops! I Left the Snowstorm Generator On is a survival adventure game. You must gather resources, craft tools, make new friends, brave a snowstorm (that you accidentally caused), and figure out a way to get back home to feed your mad scientist uncle's cat. Can you save the world from a disaster of your own making?

This game was made with MonoGame in one semester as part of the Game Programming Laboratory course at ETH Zürich. In the end, we only managed to put together the first level, and a lot of the story is left implicit, but we hope you enjoy what we have!

Controls (keyboard / gamepad):
  • Run around: WASD / Left joystick
  • Walk: run + shift/A
  • Look around: with mouse / right joystick
  • Zoom: mouse wheel / left and right trigger
  • Switch between characters: tab and shift+tab / left and right shoulder
  • Interact with objects: E / B
  • Fullscreen: ctrl/cmd + F
  • Open Inventory: Q / Y
  • Mute/Unmute: M
  • Skip Dialog: ctrl/cmd/alt + esc
Controls for debugging:
  • See frame rate: alt + F
  • Show triggers: alt + T
  • Show colliders: alt + C
  • Show heatmap: alt + H
Cheats (enabled in settings):
  • Walk or Sprint faster: hold alt
  • Spawn a campfire: right click
  • Spawn a heating tower: alt + right click
  • Jump to train: ctrl/cmd + T
  • Jump to end of level 1: ctrl/cmd + Z
